LanguageData.EnableStorytellerSwitchingSettingToolTip: Enables Hotseat to dynamically change your storyteller midgame.
LanguageData.StorytellersArrayEnabledSettingTooltip: Storytellers that Hotseat is allowed to switch to.
LanguageData.changeOnEventChanceTooltip: Percentage chance that the storyteller changes after an event.
LanguageData.changeOnMonthChanceTooltip: Percentage chance that the storyteller changes after a new month.
LanguageData.changeOnYearChanceTooltip: Percentage chance that the storyteller changes after a new year.
